channel.title: why does it move like that
channel.description: 30 minutes i spent in the options menu trying to make the gaem playable. And failed. i played space sim games wher the ship handles better than this guy. Why does it rock like a boat when you strafe? is he drunk? why does it have momentum when you move and stop forward and backwards? Overall It feels like he weights 500 pounds. Another great shooter that i am enjoying right now is borderlands 2. time spent in the menus 0 seconds. this is unplayable

item.title: why does it move like that
item.dc:creator: Bulik
item.description:
tldr:

Overall It feels like he weights 500 pounds

192.73 lbs, to be specific.

Not too shabby for being in High Impact Reactive Armor.

Read full topic

item.title: why does it move like that
item.dc:creator: Taceo
item.description:
If the movement speed bothers you that much you can get technical and customize your speed, acceleration, etc. in single player with console commands.

item.title: why does it move like that
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
As xeoxer said, disabling view bobbing will fix the view rocking from side to side. I love it personally, but it’s not for everyone.

As for the movement feel, our movement is pretty much stock Source.

Read full topic
item.source: why does it move like that

item.title: why does it move like that
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
About the rocking, disable view bobbing.

Read full topic
item.source: why does it move like that

item.title: why does it move like that
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Oi, fuck it, I’ll bite the bait.

  1. It was like that in the original, and seeing as this is a remake, well…
  2. It’s call velocity. It’s a thing. All Source games have it.
  3. Probably weighs closer to 250.
  4. Congratulations.

Read full topic
item.source: why does it move like that
